<<div class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|module>> Configuration: <<span class='code'|sig>><<a_api subproject="client" text=".." | module Eliom_comet.Configuration >><<span class='code'|end>>>>~Change the reactivity of channels~. ~Multiples configurations ~( of

<<div id="VALset_time_between_request" class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|val>> set~_time~_between~_request : <<span class="code type"|<<a_api subproject="client" text="t" | type Eliom_comet.Configuration.t >> -> float -> unit>>>><<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|set~_active~_until~_timeout c v>> sets the activity changing
